ComicInfo.Title: MILFS On Mars
ComicInfo.Summary: Purveyor of perky perversion Rebecca, best known for her steamy Sapphic suburban scenes in her monster-hit titles Housewives at Play, Teens at Play, and Hot Moms, launches her luscious lesbian ladies into a new frontier of fantasy, fetish and frolic â€“ outer space! Rebecca rolls out a rocket-powered ration of roving reprobates on the red planet. Zero gravity looks good on this batch of mature, Mars-dwelling, mammary mamas! Lushly rendered in pencils, life for the experienced spacewoman in the place where no man has gone before is detailed with a light, lustful touch. These seasoned, sexy space cadets will get your rocket firing as they keep each other company on their interplanetary journey, encountering ray-guns, robots, and wild alien life forms. Make sure your oxygen tanks are full because Rebecca will take your breath away with this out-of-this-world collection! 48-page softcover.
